My wife and mother in law do not eat seafood.  I spent 20 minutes with the hotel staff working on a dinner reservation.  I guess that work paid off.  This was our best meal after 3 days and 4 nights in Barcelona.  There are choices if you want carne and choices of you want seafood.  The paella was amazing.  My father in law, a seafood lover, said it was the best ceviche he has had in his life.  It's a quaint place with plenty of personality.  The kind of place you dream about visiting when you go to Barcelona.  We were so happy with this meal.
